title: Infura
description: Infura's Web3 API provides a simple and convenient way to connect to the Ethereum, Polygon, Arbitrum, and Optimism blockchain networks. With Infura, developers can quickly and easily integrate Web3 functionality into their projects, without having to worry about the technical details of setting up and maintaining a connection. Infura's goal is to make it as easy as possible for developers to access the full power of Web3 technology, so they can build great software.
